ZikrInEnglish: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him
All praise is due to Allah
There is no god but Allah
I seek forgiveness from Allah
Allah is the Greatest
There is no power and no strength except with Allah
ZikrInArabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ

ZikrInEnglish: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the Best Disposer of affairs
Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him, Glory be to Allah the Great
ZikrInArabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ

ZikrInEnglish: My Lord, increase me in knowledge
There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers
ZikrInArabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ

ZikrInEnglish: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
Say, 'He is Allah, [Who is] One'
Allah, the Almighty, has spoken the truth
I seek refuge with Allah from the accursed Satan
Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease
And when My servants ask you concerning Me, indeed I am near
ZikrInArabic: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ

ZikrInEnglish: Exalted is He in Whose hand is the dominion of all things and to Him you will be returned
ZikrInArabic: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

ZikrInEnglish: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter and protect us from the punishment of the Fire
ZikrInArabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنا عَذَابَ النَّارِ

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, Allah commands you to uphold justice
Say, 'Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whatever [you call - to Him], to Him belong the best names.'
ZikrInArabic: قُلِ ادْعُوا اللَّهَ أَوِ ادْعُوا الرَّحْمَنَ ۚ أَيَّمَا تَدْعُوا فَلَهُ الْأَسْمَاءُ الْحُسْنَى

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him
Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest
Say, 'O Allah, Owner of the Kingdom, You give the Kingdom to whom You will and You take the Kingdom from whom You will'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ اللَّهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَن تَشَاءُ وَتَنزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِّن مَّن تَشَاءُ

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, your ally is none but Allah and His Messenger
There is no deity except Allah, Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah
ZikrInArabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ

ZikrInEnglish: Allah is sufficient for us
Indeed, Allah is the best of planners
Say, 'Nothing will harm us except what Allah has decreed for us'
ZikrInArabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, Allah is Ever-Mighty, Ever-Wise
Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we forget or make a mistake
ZikrInArabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا

ZikrInEnglish: And whosoever fears Allah... He will make a way for him to escape
ZikrInArabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ... يَجْعَلْ لَهُ مَخْرَجًا

ZikrInEnglish: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of the people, the King of the people, the God of the people'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ مَلِكِ النَّاسِ إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, Allah is the best of protectors
Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is within themselves
ZikrInArabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّى يُغَيِّرُوا مَا بِأَنْفُسِهِمْ

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, your ally is none but Allah, His Messenger, and those who have believed
ZikrInArabic: إِنَّ وَلِيُّكُمُ اللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا

ZikrInEnglish: Say, 'My prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحْيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, I ask You for Your mercy
And Allah is the best of planners
Indeed, Allah is with the patient
Our Lord, do not cause our hearts to deviate after You have guided us
ZikrInArabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا

ZikrInEnglish: Say, 'O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, Allah is the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate
And He is with you wherever you may be
Say, 'O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is beneficial'
Indeed, Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth
Say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge'
Indeed, Allah is the Best of Providers
And your ally is none but Allah and His Messenger
Say, 'I take refuge in the Lord of the people, the King of the people, the God of the people'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ مَلِكِ النَّاسِ إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, Allah is the Best of protectors
Indeed, your ally is none but Allah, His Messenger, and those who have believed
ZikrInArabic: إِنَّ وَلِيُّكُمُ اللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا

ZikrInEnglish: Say, 'My prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحْيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, I ask You for Your mercy
And Allah is the best of planners
Indeed, Allah is with the patient
Our Lord, do not cause our hearts to deviate after You have guided us
ZikrInArabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا

ZikrInEnglish: Say, 'O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ

ZikrInEnglish: Indeed, Allah is the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate
And He is with you wherever you may be
Say, 'O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is beneficial'
Indeed, Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth
Say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge'
Indeed, Allah is the Best of Providers

Say, 'I take refuge in the Lord of the people, the King of the people, the God of the people'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ مَلِكِ النَّاسِ إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ

ZikrInArabic: إِنَّ وَلِيُّكُمُ اللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا

ZikrInEnglish: Say, 'My prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds'
ZikrInArabic: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحْيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, I ask You for Your mercy
